# docker_org (Data Source)

Reads information about a Docker Hub organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_name` (String) The organization name.

### Read-Only

- `company` (String) The company name.
- `date_joined` (String) When the organization was created.
- `full_name` (String) The full name of the organization.
- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `location` (String) The location of the organization.
